long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ReadMate is a free, feature-rich browser extension designed to assist individuals with learning disabilities, such as Dyslexia, ADHD, and Dyscalculia. Our mission is to make reading accessible, enjoyable, and frustration-free.

Key Features:
- Reads aloud highlighted text on any webpage or uploaded document.
- High-quality voices with adjustable reading speed and tone for a personalized experience.

Text Highlighting
- Synchronized highlighting to follow along as the text is read aloud, making it easier to comprehend and retain information.

Magnifying Tool
- A built-in magnifier that enlarges text as you hover over it, reducing eye strain and improving focus.

File Upload
- Upload your own documents (PDFs, .docx, text files) to have them read aloud with all the benefits of TTS and highlighting

Customizable Colors
- Choose from a variety of highlight colors to suit your preference or accessibility needs

Night and Dark Modes
- Reduce glare and improve readability in low-light environments with customizable night and dark modes.
